title: Game not letting me change clients
body: I've tried accessing my EUW, EUNE accounts and it just won't let me do it. I'm constantly locked into my NA account the client reboots itself when I click another server but boots up as NA again and I'm not sure what exactly is wrong.

replies.body: That's a pretty odd error to be having. It sounds like something might have messed up during the last patch so let's try getting that patch applied again. Grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the option **force repatch** turned on. If that doesn't work, go ahead and run it again, but this time with **reinstall** turned on instead.
